channel.title: Ip banning command - and i am mad!
channel.description: i need a code quick for a command to ip ban. i am using progject 16 edit 8. help. [br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2007, 02:28:38 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Ip banning command - and i am mad!

item.description:
@HazzardScape wrote:

well i think the best thing you can do would be …add a void that declars the players ip and sending it to ipban then make a command and insert the void name in it if you get my drift lol

item.source: Ip banning command - and i am mad!

item.title: Ip banning command - and i am mad!
item.dc:creator: @texis11 texis11
item.description:
@texis11 wrote:

Go into your server folder, then type the data folder that is in there, then open the “bannedips” up and put the IP you want to be banned in there (test with 127.0.0.1 first and try to log on to see if it works, then if you can’t get on it works, then just remove the IP from the list). To get a characters IP, go into the character folder, open the character you want IP banned, check the “last connection = NUMBERTHATYOUSHALLTYPEHERE” and there you set.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

Ok im getting pissed off!

Ok, i think you mean people, anyways just get the persons name in your server go to your char folder and get the ip and put it in the Ipban list, there are easier methods, but i highly doubt you have them, because if you did, you wouldn’t be posting here. =/

errors r bitch , sorry they are.

anyways,follow these steps it might help.

-kando2 lol
